connector.description: Forward data to an Azure Function.

camel.kamelet.azure-functions-sink.url.name: camel.kamelet.azure-functions-sink.url
camel.kamelet.azure-functions-sink.url.description: The Azure Functions URL you want to send the data to. Example: https://azure-function-demo-12234.azurewebsites.net/api/httpexample

camel.kamelet.azure-functions-sink.key.name: camel.kamelet.azure-functions-sink.key
camel.kamelet.azure-functions-sink.key.description: A function-specific API key is required, if the authLevel of the function is FUNCTION or master key if the authLevel is ADMIN.
